name: Anthem
author: Ayn Rand
description: Anthem: A dystopian novella depicting a society where individuality is suppressed, and one man's quest for freedom and self-discovery.

name: A Journey to the Centre of the Earth
author: Jules Verne
description: A Journey to the Centre of the Earth: A thrilling adventure following explorers as they delve into the depths of the Earth's core, encountering wonders and dangers along the way.

name: A Princess of Mars
author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
description: A Princess of Mars: An epic tale of interplanetary romance and adventure as a Confederate soldier finds himself on Mars, where he becomes embroiled in the conflicts of its exotic inhabitants.

name: The Machine Stops
author: E. M. Forster
description: The Machine Stops: A chilling science fiction story exploring the consequences of overreliance on technology, set in a future where humanity lives underground and depends entirely on a vast, malfunctioning machine for survival.
